verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You call the sun to rise
You lay it down to rest
You hold this heart of mine
You hold my every breath

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Such an awesome God
So mighty, so holy, so wonderful
Such an awesome God
So selfless, so generous
So faithful, Your are

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Seated in majesty
Beaming in holiness
The table is set for me
For You are the living breath

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Nothing comes close
To the Lord Almighty
Nothing as sweet as
His love and mercy

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus the Son of God
Hung on a cross to die
But not even death itself
Could hold you down
For you rose to life

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Such an awesome God
So mighty, so holy, so wonderful
Such an awesome god
So selfless, so generous
So faithful, You are
